Package org.solar.engine

Class Input

java.lang.Object
org.solar.engine.Input
public class Input extends Object
Handles all user input.

      public static org.joml.Vector2i getMousePosDelta()
      Returns change in mouse position since last frame.
      Returns:

    • getScrollInput

      public static float getScrollInput()
      Returns scroll input from a mouse wheel.
      Returns:

    • initialise

      public static void initialise(long windowHandle)
      Initialises the input class, handled by the engine. The user shouldn't need to call this class.
      Parameters:
      windowHandle - Current glfw window pointer.

    • isKeyDown

      public static boolean isKeyDown(int keyCode)
      Checks if a certain key is pressed.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - Key code of the key.
      Returns:

    • isMouseButtonDown

      public static boolean isMouseButtonDown(int mouseButtonCode)
      Checks if mouse button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      mouseButtonCode - Key code of the mouse button.
      Returns:

    • addKeyCallback

      public static void addKeyCallback(int keyCode, int act, Runnable callback)
      Adds key callback that will be executed when a certain conditions are met.
      Parameters:
      keyCode - Key code of the key that must be pressed.
      act - Action that must happen (KEY_PRESS/KEY_RELEASE/KEY_REPEAT).
      callback - Callback that shall be executed.

    • getMousePosition

      public static org.joml.Vector2i getMousePosition()
      Returns current mouse position in pixels.
      Returns:
